author: Duplicate vjandrea
post_text: June 26, 2018 at 7:56 AM#1Hello there,I'm searching an efficient way to adjust Group Masters via command line: right now I set the level of the assigned executor, likeCodeExecutor 1."OUT" At 100but i was wondering if there's a more efficient way to do it. I see that SpecialMasters don't include Group Masters and the GroupMaster keyword does not exist. Any suggestion?thanksandrea
title: Adjusting Group Master via command line
